vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: lastMsg in Log.addMessage (patch_0.sol#48) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_0.sol#16-22):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_0.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_0.sol#20)

external-function

Detected issues with version pragma in patch_0.sol:
